title: Vietnam Ascends in Global AI Readiness Rankings
description: Vietnam has advanced significantly technologically, ranking 39th out of 193 countries in the global Artificial Intelligence (AI) readiness rating. The esteemed UK think tank Oxford Insights highlights this viewpoint in its 2023 study. This accomplishment highlights Vietnam’s quick success in incorporating AI technologies into its agenda for national development. Vietnam’s remarkable leap in AI readiness […]
